definition: A term commonly used to refer to a recently arrived individual who has just entered the world, typically within the first few weeks of their life.

examples.german: Die Eltern freuen sich über ihr neugeborenes Baby.
examples.english: The parents are happy about their newborn baby.

examples.german: Das Neugeborene hat noch keine Zähne.
examples.english: The newborn doesn't have any teeth yet.
